ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod C ) e. RR ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod C ) e. CC ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod C ) e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( B mod C ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( B mod C ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( B mod C ) e. CC ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_addcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod C ) + ( B mod C ) ) = ( ( B mod C ) + ( A mod C ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod C ) + ( B mod C ) ) mod C ) = ( ( ( B mod C ) + ( A mod C ) ) mod C ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_jca | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( B mod C ) e. RR /\ B e. RR ) ) |

| 12 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> C e. RR+ ) |
| 13 | 1, 12 | #P_jca | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod C ) e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod C ) e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_modabs2 | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( B mod C ) mod C ) = ( B mod C ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( B mod C ) mod C ) = ( B mod C ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_modadd1 | |- ( ( ( ( B mod C ) e. RR /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( ( A mod C ) e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) /\ ( ( B mod C ) mod C ) = ( B mod C ) ) -> ( ( ( B mod C ) + ( A mod C ) ) mod C ) = ( ( B + ( A mod C ) ) mod C ) ) |
| 18 | 11, 14, 16, 17 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( B mod C ) + ( A mod C ) ) mod C ) = ( ( B + ( A mod C ) ) mod C ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_recn | |- ( B e. RR -> B e. CC ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 21 | 3, 20 | #P_addcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod C ) + B ) = ( B + ( A mod C ) ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod C ) + B ) mod C ) = ( ( B + ( A mod C ) ) mod C ) ) |
| 23 | 18, 22 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( B mod C ) + ( A mod C ) ) mod C ) = ( ( ( A mod C ) + B ) mod C ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 25 | 1, 24 | #P_jca | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod C ) e. RR /\ A e. RR ) ) |

| 27 |  | #P_3simpc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) ) |
| 28 |  | #P_modabs2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod C ) mod C ) = ( A mod C ) ) |
| 29 | 28 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod C ) mod C ) = ( A mod C ) ) |
| 30 |  | #P_modadd1 | |- ( ( ( ( A mod C ) e. RR /\ A e. RR ) /\ ( B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) /\ ( ( A mod C ) mod C ) = ( A mod C ) ) -> ( ( ( A mod C ) + B ) mod C ) = ( ( A + B ) mod C ) ) |
| 31 | 26, 27, 29, 30 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod C ) + B ) mod C ) = ( ( A + B ) mod C ) ) |
| 32 | 8, 23, 31 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod C ) + ( B mod C ) ) mod C ) = ( ( A + B ) mod C ) ) |
